messages.content:
The user asked you to create the source code with the following specification:
```
<REQUEST>
<goal>count the values in `simpleValue2`</goal>

<description>Count the occurrences of each value in the `simpleValue2` field, creating a üìä frequency distribution chart</description>
</REQUEST>
<PLAN>1. Extract the array of strings from simpleValue2.values
2. Count occurrences of each unique value using a frequency counter algorithm
3. Format the results as a structured object with value-count pairs</PLAN>
<SPEC>The counter will analyze the array of strings in the simpleValue2.values field and count how many times each unique value appears. It will generate a frequency distribution showing each unique value and its count. The results will be presented in a structured format that can be used to create a chart visualization.</SPEC>
```
